name: Automated Github Org+Team Invites (dev-branch)
description: Out-of-the-box solution to automatic Github Organization (and team) invitations

GITHUB_TOKEN.description: A Github access token to activate the Octokit Github Client

ORGANIZATION_NAME.description: You can confirm it by going to your org's dashboard. The URL will be: https://github.com/orgs/{ORGANIZATION_NAME}/dashboard

TEAM_NAME.description: You can confirm it by going to your team's page. The URL will be: https://github.com/orgs/{ORGANIZATION_NAME}/teams/{TEAM_NAME}

BACKGROUND_COLOR.description: Background color for front page. Can be one of [grey, white, blue, green, red, pink]
